if.test: dzlx != null and dzlx != '' and dzlx != '0A00'
jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.dzid dzid, t.sjdzid sjdzid, t.dzlx dzlx, t.dzbm dzbm, t.dzmc dzmc, t.dzjc dzjc, t.dzdz dzdz, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.xzqh xzqh, t.lxr lxr, t.lxdh lxdh, t.czhm czhm, t.zqcls zqcls, t.zbqcs zbqcs, t.mhjzl mhjzl, t.gxsys gxsys, t.gxzddws gxzddws, t.xqmj xqmj, t.xqfw xqfw, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name dzlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DZLX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY t.dzbm

SELECT , tcode1.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL tcode1 ON (t.xzqh = tcode1.code_value AND tcode1.codeid='61CFA4E7B188490A873395B4FB237C84') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.DZID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS dzid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,lon,lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,zqcls,zbqcs,mhjzl,gxsys,gxzddws,xqmj,xqfw,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES(#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zbqcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mhjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gxsys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gxzddws,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.DZID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,lon,lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,zqcls,zbqcs,mhjzl,gxsys,gxzddws,xqmj,xqfw,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y) VALUES
#{item.dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzid,#{item.sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjdzid,#{item.dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlx,#{item.dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzbm,#{item.dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzmc,#{item.dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzjc,#{item.dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdz,#{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lon,#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lat,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxdh,#{item.czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czhm,#{item.zqcls,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqcls,#{item.zbqcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zbqcs,#{item.mhjzl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} mhjzl,#{item.gxsys,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gxsys,#{item.gxzddws,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gxzddws,#{item.xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xqmj,#{item.xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xqfw,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dzid = VALUES(dzid), sjdzid = VALUES(sjdzid), dzlx = VALUES(dzlx), dzbm = VALUES(dzbm), dzmc = VALUES(dzmc), dzjc = VALUES(dzjc), dzdz = VALUES(dzdz), lon = VALUES(lon), lat = VALUES(lat), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxdh = VALUES(lxdh), czhm = VALUES(czhm), zqcls = VALUES(zqcls), zbqcs = VALUES(zbqcs), mhjzl = VALUES(mhjzl), gxsys = VALUES(gxsys), gxzddws = VALUES(gxzddws), xqmj = VALUES(xqmj), xqfw = VALUES(xqfw), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y)
mapper.select: SELECT , t2.uuid uuid, t2.xygbrs xygbrs, t2.zfzzxfys zfzzxfys, t2.wzgys wzgys, t2.xxzhids xxzhids, t2.xxzhongds xxzhongds, t2.zdzxm zdzxm, t2.zdzlxfs zdzlxfs, t2.zdzwxm zdzwxm, t2.zdzwlxfs zdzwlxfs FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ_ZONGD t2 ON t.dzid=t2.dzid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , t2.uuid uuid, t2.xygbrs xygbrs, t2.zfzzxfys zfzzxfys, t2.xfwys xfwys, t2.xxdads xxdads, t2.xxzhongds xxzhongds, CASE t2.sfdljj WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END sfdljj, t2.zdzxm zdzxm, t2.zdzlxfs zdzlxfs, t2.zdzwxm zdzwxm, t2.zdzwlxfs zdzwlxfs FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ_ZHID t2 ON t.dzid=t2.dzid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , t2.uuid uuid, t2.xygbrs xygbrs, t2.zfzzxfys zfzzxfys, t2.xfwys xfwys, t2.xxzhongds xxzhongds, CASE t2.sfdljj WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END sfdljj, t2.ddzxm ddzxm, t2.ddzlxfs ddzlxfs, t2.jdyxm jdyxm, t2.jdylxfs jdylxfs, t2.fddzxm fddzxm, t2.fddzlxfs fddzlxfs, t2.fjdyxm fjdyxm, t2.fjdylxfs fjdylxfs FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ_DAD t2 ON t.dzid=t2.dzid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , t2.uuid uuid, t2.xyrs xyrs, t2.zfzzxfys zfzzxfys, t2.mrzqrs mrzqrs, t2.zdzxm zdzxm, t2.zdzlxfs zdzlxfs, t2.zdyxm zdyxm, t2.zdylxfs zdylxfs, t2.fzdyxm fzdyxm, t2.fzdylxfs fzdylxfs, t2.fzdzxm1 fzdzxm1, t2.fzdzlxfs1 fzdzlxfs1, t2.fzdzxm2 fzdzxm2, t2.fzdzlxfs2 fzdzlxfs2, t2.fzdzxm3 fzdzxm3, t2.fzdzlxfs3 fzdzlxfs3 FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ_ZHONGD t2 ON t.dzid=t2.dzid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , t2.uuid uuid, t2.xfdyzrs xfdyzrs, t2.mrzqrs mrzqrs, t2.gxdw gxdw, t2.gxdwlxfs gxdwlxfs, t2.dzxm dzxm, t2.dzlxfs dzlxfs FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ_QTXFDW t2 ON t.dzid=t2.dzid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name dzlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DZLX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.dzid IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZID = #{dzid} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.xzqh like concat(#{xzqh},'%')
and t.dzmc like concat(concat('%',#{dzmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\'
ORDER BY t.dzbm
SELECT dzid,dzjc,dzbm FROM YAGL_XFDZ WHERE delete_flag = 'N' AND sjdzid = #{value} AND substr(dzlx,0,2)!='0A' order by dzbm
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND dzmc = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ_ZONGD(uuid,dzid,xygbrs,zfzzxfys,wzgys,xxzhids,xxzhongds,zdzxm,zdzlxfs,zdzwxm,zdzwlxfs,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xygbrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zfzzxfys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{wzgys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xxzhids,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xxzhongds,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdzlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdzwxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdzwlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ_DAD(uuid,dzid,xygbrs,zfzzxfys,xfwys,xxzhongds,sfdljj,ddzxm,ddzlxfs,jdyxm,jdylxfs,fddzxm,fddzlxfs,fjdyxm,fjdylxfs,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xygbrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zfzzxfys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfwys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xxzhongds,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sfdljj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ddzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ddzlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdylxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fddzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fddzlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fjdyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fjdylxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ_ZHONGD(uuid,dzid,xyrs,zfzzxfys,mrzqrs,zdzxm,zdzlxfs,zdyxm,zdylxfs,fzdyxm,fzdylxfs,fzdzxm1,fzdzlxfs1,fzdzxm2,fzdzlxfs2,fzdzxm3,fzdzlxfs3,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xyrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zfzzxfys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mrzqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdzlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdylxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdylxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzxm1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzlxfs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzxm2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzlxfs2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzxm3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fzdzlxfs3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ_QTXFDW(uuid,dzid,xfdyzrs,mrzqrs,gxdw,gxdwlxfs,dzxm,dzlxfs,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfdyzrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mrzqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gxdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gxdwlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update:
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZONGD
uuid=#{uuid}, dzid=#{dzid}, xygbrs=#{xygbrs}, zfzzxfys=#{zfzzxfys}, wzgys=#{wzgys}, xxzhids=#{xxzhids}, xxzhongds=#{xxzhongds}, zdzxm=#{zdzxm}, zdzlxfs=#{zdzlxfs}, zdzwxm=#{zdzwxm}, zdzwlxfs=#{zdzwlxfs}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, jdh=#{jdh}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE DZID = #{dzid} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZHID
uuid=#{uuid}, dzid=#{dzid}, xygbrs=#{xygbrs}, zfzzxfys=#{zfzzxfys}, xfwys=#{xfwys}, xxdads=#{xxdads}, xxzhongds=#{xxzhongds}, sfdljj=#{sfdljj}, zdzxm=#{zdzxm}, zdzlxfs=#{zdzlxfs}, zdzwxm=#{zdzwxm}, zdzwlxfs=#{zdzwlxfs}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, jdh=#{jdh}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE DZID = #{dzid} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_DAD
uuid=#{uuid}, dzid=#{dzid}, xygbrs=#{xygbrs}, zfzzxfys=#{zfzzxfys}, xfwys=#{xfwys}, xxzhongds=#{xxzhongds}, sfdljj=#{sfdljj}, ddzxm=#{ddzxm}, ddzlxfs=#{ddzlxfs}, jdyxm=#{jdyxm}, jdylxfs=#{jdylxfs}, fddzxm=#{fddzxm}, fddzlxfs=#{fddzlxfs}, fjdyxm=#{fjdyxm}, fjdylxfs=#{fjdylxfs}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, jdh=#{jdh}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE DZID = #{dzid} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZHONGD
uuid=#{uuid}, dzid=#{dzid}, xyrs=#{xyrs}, zfzzxfys=#{zfzzxfys}, mrzqrs=#{mrzqrs}, zdzxm=#{zdzxm}, zdzlxfs=#{zdzlxfs}, zdyxm=#{zdyxm}, zdylxfs=#{zdylxfs}, fzdyxm=#{fzdyxm}, fzdylxfs=#{fzdylxfs}, fzdzxm1=#{fzdzxm1}, fzdzlxfs1=#{fzdzlxfs1}, fzdzxm2=#{fzdzxm2}, fzdzlxfs2=#{fzdzlxfs2}, fzdzxm3=#{fzdzxm3}, fzdzlxfs3=#{fzdzlxfs3}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, jdh=#{jdh}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE DZID = #{dzid} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_QTXFDW
uuid=#{uuid}, dzid=#{dzid}, xfdyzrs=#{xfdyzrs}, mrzqrs=#{mrzqrs}, gxdw=#{gxdw}, gxdwlxfs=#{gxdwlxfs}, dzxm=#{dzxm}, dzlxfs=#{dzlxfs}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, jdh=#{jdh}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE DZID = #{dzid} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZONGD t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZHID t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_DAD t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_ZHONGD t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ_QTXFDW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ_ZONGD t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.dzid = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ_ZHID t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.dzid = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ_DAD t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.dzid = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ_ZHONGD t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.dzid = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ_QTXFDW t WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.dzid = #{dzid}
